ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Where to go...
ygData.msgSnippet: I m staked out in unrest myself, just made lvl 25 there. I found if you are in skel form and invis undead only werebats will go after you. I have not died
ygData.messageBody:
I'm staked out in unrest myself, just made lvl 25 there. I found if you are in skel form and invis undead only werebats will go after you. I have not died there since I started doing that, in fact I walk all over the house unscathed ,except the basement =p.. I've been to ct and guk but it's almost impossible to get a group in those areas, may just be a bertoxx thing... Anyway if you got the patience to learn the in and out of unrest you can lvl fast and rule the area, people will beg you to join their groups. I actually get swamped with tells when I log on and zone into unrest =).. Do what you think is best for you though, and have fun =)...
----- Original Message -----
From: Jenni
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 9:09 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Where to go...

From: Jenni <freya@...>

Hi guys!

I'm real close to lvl 24 now and I'm wondering where I should be fighting.
I'm loving permafrost, but I want to move on soon.  (Don't even say
Highkeep, I hate that place.. :) ).  I checked out Sol A, but there
weren't enough people there at the time that could group with me (mostly
lvl 35 and up).  the mobs there looked great, and I found a couple nice
places to set up camp, but it might be tough to get a group going in that
situation.  Any other suggestions?  I'm really loving the dungeon scene.
big pulls, mez, and tons of exp and good loot.  Anybody have any favorite
dungeons that would be good for my level? :)

Thanks!
Ezrae Dreamstealer
Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis
